summary: A simple re-texture of the Skyrim dog to make it black with white spots and some general texture polish.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Black & White Dog Retexture 1.0 Final[/b]

Just made a simple touch up to the original bethseda dog texture since i 
think the original looks like crap with the coloring.

So i 
-Darkened the dog texture added some white/greyish spots to make it look a tad more interesting. 
-Changed to eye to one from a nordic sled dog. 
-Removed the black cracks in the paw (don\'t know why they were there, looked like shit). 
-Brushed up some areas on the skin to remove some of the unconsistency in the texture.
-Also got rid of the black line across the middle of the dog from face to tail (where the texture mirrors), big immersion breaker for me personally there.

And i have not used any SHARPEN FILTERS !!!!!! Amazing right?

Hope some of you will enjoy it!

[b]Installation[/b]
Just drop the Data folder in your main Skyrim folder.

[b]Uninstallation[/b]
Remove file dog.dds from Skyrim/Data/Textures/Actors/Dog/

Cheers!
author: MrFisse
